title: Oil consumption and cars on the road correlate

content.question: Between 1960 and 1970, world oil consumption approximately doubled. Which of the following explanations is consistent with this increase?

choices.label: The number of passengers per car increased.
The number of cars on the road increased.
Cars that were more fuel-efficient were manufactured.

content.answer: The number of cars on the road increased.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
